title: Trump to Host 2026 G20 Summit at Doral Resort, Reviving Controversial Hosting Attempt
summary: President Trump plans to host the 2026 G20 Summit at his Doral resort in Miami from December 14-15, 2026. The White House claims the event will be hosted 'at-cost' with no profit to Trump, but the move raises significant conflict of interest concerns, echoing his previously abandoned attempt to host the G7 at the same venue in 2020.
description: Trump is making plans to host the 2026 G20 Summit at his Doral golf club in Miami, echoing his first term tactic of using the presidency to drive revenue at his properties. The summit is scheduled for December 14-15, 2026, with the White House asserting the event will be hosted without direct financial gain to Trump's business.

sources.title: Trump privately discussing plans to host G20 at his Doral resort, White House official says
Trump announces plans to host 2026 G20 summit at his Doral resort in Florida
Trump Says He'll Host 2026 G-20 Summit at His Doral Resort

connections: Continued pattern of using presidential position for personal financial gain
notes: Summit scheduled for December 14-15, 2026. White House claims event will be 'at-cost' with no profit to Trump. National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett is point person, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent organizing agenda.
